$eref.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
$eref.title: Has additional properties

___display_comments.description: If false, do not render comments on this content.

___moderation_required.description: If true, comments must be moderator-approved before being displayed.

___comments_period.description: How long (in days) after publish date until comments are closed.

___allow_comments.description: If false, commenting is disabled on this content.
